mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cms_content cc LEFT JOIN pmph_user pu ON cc.author_id =pu.id LEFT JOIN cms_category ccg ON cc.category_id = ccg.id
WHERE cc.is_deleted = 0
AND ccg.id = 2
and material_id=#{materialId} AND ccg.id in (1,2)

SELECT cc.*,me.notice,m.deadline FROM cms_content cc LEFT JOIN pmph_user pu ON cc.author_id =pu.id LEFT JOIN cms_category ccg ON cc.category_id = ccg.id left join material_extra me on me.material_id=cc.material_id left join material m on m.id=cc.material_id WHERE cc.is_deleted = 0 and cc.is_published=1 and cc.auth_status=2
AND ccg.id = 2
and cc.material_id=#{materialId}
AND ccg.id in (1,2,3)
AND ccg.id in (#{order})
ORDER BY
cc.gmt_create desc
cc.is_promote desc,cc.sort_promote asc, cc.is_hot desc,cc.sort_hot asc, cc.auth_date desc
cc.auth_date DESC
cc.is_hot desc,cc.sort_hot asc
LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
